attributes.action: Allow every child to appriciate the joys of Corned Beef Hash
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Kids these days... They want everything quick and easy which is why microwave meals and chicken dippers have become such a hit. But we're forgetting one important dish... Corned beef hash! It's simple, cheap and satisfying, and even suitable for those on a diet! 

We call on Tony & Gordon to make this great food a staple on our dinner tables just like in the good old days!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
